original_title: Govt. increases annual excise licence fees
original_body_lines: The government of Sri Lanka has decided to increase the Annual Excise Licence fees with effect from 12 January 2024.
Accordingly, the Distillery Licence fee (except for Palmyra arrack) has been increased to Rs. 25 million while for Palmyra arrack it is Rs. 05 million.
Meanwhile the Licence fee for bottling of Toddy is Rs. 10 milllion.
